Package me.julb.springbootstarter.persistence.mongodb.configurations

Class PersistenceMongoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
me.julb.springbootstarter.persistence.mongodb.configurations.PersistenceMongoConfiguration
@Configuration @EnableMongoRepositories(basePackages="me.julb", repositoryFactoryBeanClass=CustomMongoRepositoryFactoryBean.class) public class PersistenceMongoConfiguration extends Object
The persistence MongoDB configuration.
